√kṣar 'flow'

present: [1.] kṣárati etc. V.+  kṣárate etc.  

perfect: cakṣāra  

aorist: ákṣār (3s.)  

[future: kṣariṣyati  kṣaritā  ]

verbal: kṣarita  kṣáradhyai  

secondary: intensive: cākṣar-   -- desiderative: cikṣariṣa-   -- causative: kṣārayati etc. B.+  

derivatives: kṣara V.+  kṣaraṇa C.  kṣāraṇa C.  kṣīrá? V.+
